column1: ilya (pl. ilyë or ilye) is a Quenya word meaning "all
column3: all of a particular group of things". (form: ilyë)

column1: *"ar ilyë tië undulávë lumbulë;" ("and all paths are drowned deep in shadow;)"
*"...i Ilúvatar i or ilyë mahalmar ea (verb) tennoio" ("the One who is above all thrones for ever")
